resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107589</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107589</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The secret cultural institution in your very own school: The school library</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die geheime kulturelle Anstalt in Ihrem besitzen 
sehr Schule: Die Schulebibliothek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'établissement culturel secret dans le votre 
possèdent très l'école : La bibliothèque d'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A instituição cultural secreta no seu possui 
muito a escola: A biblioteca da escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'istituzione culturale segreta in vostro molto 
possiede la scuola: La libreria della scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μυστικό πολιτιστικό όργανο στο πολύ 
σχολείο σας: Η σχολική βιβλιοθήκη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La institución cultural secreta en su muy posee 
la escuela: La biblioteca de la escuela</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A variety of best practices and imaginative ideas the school librarian can use to create an environment where students fuse together required learning with learning that is driven by individual interest.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Vielzahl der besten Praxis und der 
phantasiereichen Ideen, die das Schulelibrarian verwenden kann, um 
eine Umgebung zu erstellen, in der Kursteilnehmer benötigte das 
zusammen Lernen mit dem Lernen das wird angetrieben durch einzelnes 
Interesse fixieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une variété des meilleures pratiques et des 
idées imaginatives que le bibliothécaire d'école peut employer pour
créer un environnement où les étudiants fusionnent l'étude priée 
avec apprendre cela est pilotés par intérêt individuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma variedade das mais melhores práticas e de 
idéias que imaginative o bibliotecário da escola pode se usar criar 
um ambiente onde os estudantes fundam a aprendizagem junto requerida 
com aprendizagem disso sejam dirigidos pelo interesse individual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una varietà di pratiche migliori e di idee che 
immaginative il bibliotecario della scuola può usare per creare un 
ambiente in cui gli allievi fondono imparare richiesto con imparare 
quello è guidato da interesse specifico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποικίλες καλύτερες πρακτικές και επινοητικές ιδέες ο 
σχολικός βιβλιοθηκάριος μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν για να 
δημιουργήσουν ένα περιβάλλον όπου οι σπουδαστές λιώνουν τη μαζί
απαραίτητη εκμάθηση με την εκμάθηση που οδηγείται από το 
μεμονωμένο συμφέρον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una variedad de las mejores prácticas y de ideas 
imaginativas que el bibliotecario de la escuela puede utilizar para 
crear un ambiente donde los estudiantes funden aprender junto 
requerido con aprender eso son conducidos por interés individual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KIM CAMPBELL
FN:KIM CAMPBELL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107589</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-secret-cultural-institution-in-your-very-own-school-the-school-library</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
